sect2.title: Greater
sect2.para: > is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. The Greater than operator is a comparison operator. It looks at the left and right values and compares them. If the left value is greater than the right value, the operator returns true, otherwise it returns false. When the values are equal, the operator returns false.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Manager add { Manager_ID > Employee_ID Greater};
Manager_ID Employee_ID Greater ---------- ----------- ------- 1 2 False 1 3 False 2 4 False 2 6 False 4 5 False
